channel.title: Changing the IP to yourown server
channel.description: I am pretty experienced with 317 Clients, and me and my friends decided to make our own 525 server, but every time we try to make our own Client we cannot get it to work, we change the IP to our own compile and run then it just gets stuck on Connecting to Update Server. How about would I be able to fix this problem?

item.title: Changing the IP to yourown server

item.description:
@lotabe wrote:

my 525 clients never work ethier :mad:
